tuv.seg: Sherried squash soup
雪利冬南瓜汤
A good soup soon becomes a fail safe recipe for any occasion.
无论何时，备上一碗好汤总错不了。
You can always miss out the sherry if making for children
即使为了孩子而不加雪利酒，汤品依然会鲜美如常。
Ingredients
食材：
Serves 4
四人份
1 large onion, halved
1颗大洋葱，切半
dry (fino) sherry
4勺干（淡色）雪利酒
1 kg butternut squash peeled, deseeded and chopped
1千克冬南瓜，削皮、去籽、切块儿
600 ml hot vegetable stock (we like Marigold)
600毫升热蔬菜高汤（Marigold牌不错）
seed bread croutons and flat leaf parsley
一些油煎瓜仁面包丁和宽叶欧芹
olive oil
2勺橄榄油
Method
制作方法：
Fry the onion in the oil for 5 mins until softened.
1.热油，洋葱入锅翻炒5分钟至软。
Add the sherry and squash and sizzle for 1-2 mins.
倒入雪利酒和冬南瓜烹制1-2分钟。
Pour in the stock, then cover and simmer for 20 mins until the squash is tender when pierced with a knife.
加入高汤，然后盖盖儿炖上20分钟直至南瓜软烂。
Whizz in a food processor until smooth. Will keep in the fridge for 2 days, or freeze for 6 weeks.
2.将菜糊倒入搅拌机里搅拌均匀，之后可入冰箱保鲜2天或冷冻长达6周。
When ready to eat, reheat until bubbling and serve in small portions topped with seed-bread croutons (see above right) and a parsley sprig.
如需食用，只要将汤重新煮开，撒上面包丁和欧芹叶即可。
Nutrition per serving
营养价值：
183 kcalories, protein 4.0g, carbohydrate 26.0g, fat 6.0g, saturated fat 1.0g, fibre 5.0g, salt 0.22g.
卡路里：183卡蛋白质：4.0克，碳水化合物：26.0克，脂肪：6.0克，饱和脂肪：1.0克，纤维素：5.0克，盐：0.22克
